function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lockdown measures in eu member states","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of covid-19 within the eu due to investment fund activities and interactions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for public health risk in investment decision making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of social responsibility in investment strategies during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dynamic contagion of covid-19 across the european union","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Staggered overall response and financial speculation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on diverse range of funds in europe","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investors using alternate options to park their funds due to economic deterioration","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declining yields on treasury instruments due to extreme pressure on public finances from covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in fund returns reflecting the impact of systemic shocks like covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider viral epidemics as a significant risk","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scant evidence on economic and social impact of epidemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global financial system volatility due to contagious epidemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of technical language without context","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases among the 150,000 people detected in the oxford town centre due to close proximity","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with viewpoint-independent human classification algorithm that may lead to overlooking potential health risks and disease transmission patterns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public sharing of materials and sample videos may lead to misuse of technology for covert surveillance or unethical monitoring practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai and computer vision technology for social distancing monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Availability of data in github repository","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of human detector model for monitoring public spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accumulating approach to highlighting risky zones in covered areas with poor ventilation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate risk assessment due to varying contamination trends in different areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate long-term monitoring of crowd behavior and contamination trends","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of increased density of contamination in covered places with minimal ventilation due to static people","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of high traffic areas showing stronger contamination heatmaps","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of social distancing violations leading to high-risk categories of individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection and tracking of individual movement data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of high-risk zones and creation of risk heat-map","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of environmental noise for visualization of heat-map","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identifying couples based on proximity and time could lead to inaccurate assumptions about their actual relationship, potentially missing true social contacts or interactions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of proximity-based social distancing measures may result in privacy concerns and resistance from individuals.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for identifying social distancing violations may lead to errors in detection and interpretation of human behaviors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consensus on social distancing guidelines for family members and couples","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of inter-people distance due to controversial opinions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unrecognized social distancing violations in risky zones","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of people with partial visibility or truncated objects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in extreme lighting conditions and lens distortion effects","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social distancing violation due to inaccurate distance measurements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mass deployment of the system in large shopping malls","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of real-time performance hardware with low accuracy in social distancing monitoring","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure of social distancing monitoring models with low speed","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Frequent cases of occlusions, overlaps, and crowded zones in the dataset","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal condition for speed and generalisability testing on the otc dataset","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Benchmarking tests and comparisons conducted on a single hardware and software platform","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Training on a large number of samples from the google open images dataset, including human body parts, increases the risk of model overfitting to specific characteristics of that dataset and may not generalize well to other datasets.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing a transfer learning approach with pre-trained models may introduce biases and assumptions from the source dataset microsoft coco into the human detection model, leading to biased predictions and potential fairness issues.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using stochastic gradient descent sgd with warm restarts and a cosine annealing learning rate schedule may lead to challenges in hyperparameter tuning and model convergence, as well as the need for careful adjustment of learning rate values.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through close human interaction and contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate training data for human detection model","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the geometric transformation and mapping in the context of computer vision","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
